rpm.install_script: #!/bin/sh set -e rm -Rf /tmp/%(flavor)s export BUILDROOT="/tmp/%(flavor)s/BUILDROOT" export RPM_DIR="/tmp/%(flavor)s/RPMS" mkdir -p /tmp/%(flavor)s/{BUILDROOT,RPMS,BUILD} pwd cd .. ./configure --prefix=${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus \ --exec_prefix=${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus \ --with-labview=$LABVIEW_DIR \ --with-jdk=$JDK_DIR \ --with-idl=$IDL_DIR \ --with-gsi=/usr:gcc64 \ --host=x86-64-linux \ --with-java_target=6 --with-java_bootclasspath=$(pwd)/rt.jar make clean >/dev/null env LANG=en_US.UTF-8 make env MDSPLUS_VERSION=%(mdsplus_version)s make install mv ${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus/lib ${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus/lib64 mv ${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus/bin ${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus/bin64 make clean >/dev/null ./configure --prefix=${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus \ --exec_prefix=${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus \ --with-labview=$LABVIEW_DIR \ --with-jdk=$JDK_DIR \ --with-idl=$IDL_DIR \ --with-gsi=/usr:gcc32 \ --host=i686-linux \ --with-java_target=6 --with-java_bootclasspath=$(pwd)/rt.jar make clean >/dev/null env LANG=en_US.UTF-8 make env MDSPLUS_VERSION=%(mdsplus_version)s make install mv ${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus/lib ${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus/lib32 mv ${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus/bin ${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus/bin32 make clean >/dev/null mkdir -p /tmp/%(flavor)s/BUILDROOT/etc/yum.repos.d mkdir -p /tmp/%(flavor)s/BUILDROOT/etc/pki/rpm-gpg/ cp deploy/RPM-GPG-KEY-MDSplus /tmp/%(flavor)s/BUILDROOT/etc/pki/rpm-gpg/ outfile=/tmp/%(flavor)s/BUILDROOT/etc/yum.repos.d/mdsplus%(rflavor)s.repo echo [MDSplus%(rflavor)s] > $outfile cat - >> $outfile <<EOF name=MDSplus%(rflavor)s baseurl=http://www.mdsplus.org/dist/%(dist)s/%(flavor)s/RPMS enabled=1 EOF cat - >>$outfile <<EOF gpgcheck=1 gpgkey=file:///etc/pki/rpm-gpg/RPM-GPG-KEY-MDSplus metadata_expire=300 EOF
rpm.spec_start: %%define debug_package %%{nil} %%global _missing_build_ids_terminate_build 0 %%global _unpackaged_files_terminate_build 0 Name: mdsplus%(rflavor)s%(packagename)s Version: %(major)d.%(minor)d Release: %(release)s.%(dist)s License: BSD Open Source - Copyright (c) 2010, Massachusetts Institute of Technology All rights reserved. Source: https://github.com/MDSplus/mdsplus/archive/%(BRANCH)s_release-%(major)d-%(minor)d-%(release)d.tar.gz URL: http://www.mdsplus.org Vendor: Massachusetts Institute of Technology Packager: Plasma Science and Fusion Center <mdsplus@www.mdsplus.org> Summary: %(summary)s Group: Applications/Archiving Prefix: /usr/local AutoReqProv: yes

ubuntu.install_script:
#!/bin/bash set -e if [ ! -r ~/.gnupg ] then tar zxfC /mdsplus/certs/rpm-signing-keys.tgz ~/ fi sudo rm -Rf /tmp/%(flavor)s/apt rm -Rf /tmp/%(flavor)s export BUILDROOT="/tmp/%(flavor)s/BUILDROOT" mkdir -p /tmp/%(flavor)s/{BUILDROOT,REPO,DEBS} mkdir -p /tmp/%(flavor)s/REPO/{conf,pool,dists,db} cat - <<EOF > /tmp/%(flavor)s/REPO/conf/distributions Origin: MDSplus Development Team Label: MDSplus Codename: MDSplus Version: %(major)d.%(minor)d.%(release)d Architectures: i386 amd64 source Components: alpha beta stable Description: MDSplus packages SignWith: MDSplus EOF
if [ -z "$ARCH" ] then ARCH=$(uname -p) fi if [ "$ARCH" == "x86_64" -o "$ARCH" == "amd64" ] then bits=64 host=x86_64-linux else bit2=32 host=i686-linux fi cd .. ./configure --prefix=${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus \ --exec_prefix=${BUILDROOT}/usr/local/mdsplus \ --with-labview=$LABVIEW_DIR \ --with-jdk=$JDK_DIR \ --with-idl=$IDL_DIR \ --with-gsi=/usr:gcc${bits} \ --with-java_target=6 --with-java_bootclasspath=$(pwd)/rt.jar \ --host=$host make clean >/dev/null env LANG=en_US.UTF-8 make env MDSPLUS_VERSION=%(mdsplus_version)s make install make clean >/dev/null
